movie_tagging.system:
You are a movie tag classifier. Your task is to analyze the movie description and output exactly one tag that best describes the movie. Your output must meet the following strict conditions:
1. The output must be exactly one of the following tags
2. Do not include any extra text, punctuation, symbols, quotes, or brackets. Only the tag text should be present.
3. There should be no leading or trailing whitespace, and the output must be a single line.
Follow these instructions exactly.
movie_tagging.prompt:
Which tag does this movie relate to among the following tags? Just answer with the tag name without further explanation. tags: [sci-fi, based on a book, comedy, action, twist ending, dystopia, dark comedy, classic, psychology, fantasy, romance, thought-provoking, social commentary, violence, true story]
 description: {} tag:
movie_tagging.full_prompt:
Which tag does this movie relate to among the following tags? Just answer with the tag name without further explanation. tags: [sci-fi, based on a book, comedy, action, twist ending, dystopia, dark comedy, classic, psychology, fantasy, romance, thought-provoking, social commentary, violence, true story]
 description: {} tag: {}
movie_tagging.retrieval_query:
Which tag does this movie relate to among the following tags? Just answer with the tag name without further explanation.
 description: {description}
movie_tagging.retrieval_query_wokey:
Which tag does this movie relate to among the following tags? Just answer with the tag name without further explanation.
 description: {}
movie_tagging.OPPU_input:
Which tag does this movie relate to among the following tags? Just answer with the tag name without further explanation. tags: [sci-fi, based on a book, comedy, action, twist ending, dystopia, dark comedy, classic, psychology, fantasy, romance, thought-provoking, social commentary, violence, true story]
 description: {description} tag:
movie_tagging.OPPU_full:
Which tag does this movie relate to among the following tags? Just answer with the tag name without further explanation. tags: [sci-fi, based on a book, comedy, action, twist ending, dystopia, dark comedy, classic, psychology, fantasy, romance, thought-provoking, social commentary, violence, true story]
 description: {description} tag: {tag}

citation.prompt:

paper title: {} reference:

paper title: {} reference: {}
citation.retrieval_query:
Identify the most relevant reference for the listed publication by the researcher. Select the reference paper that is most closely related to the researcher's work. Please respond with only the number that corresponds to the reference.
paper title: {title}
citation.retrieval_query_wokey:
Identify the most relevant reference for the listed publication by the researcher. Select the reference paper that is most closely related to the researcher's work. Please respond with only the number that corresponds to the reference.
paper title: {}

news_categorize.system:
You are a news category classifier. Your task is to determine which single category best describes the provided article from the following list
1) Answer with only one category exactly as it appears in the list.
2) Do not include any extra words, punctuation, or multiple categories.
3) Your output must be a single line containing only the category name.
news_categorize.prompt:
Which category does this article relate to among the following categories? Just answer with the category name without further explanation. categories: [travel, education, parents, style & beauty, entertainment, food & drink, science & technology, business, sports, healthy living, women, politics, crime, culture & arts, religion]
 article: {} category:
news_categorize.full_prompt:
Which category does this article relate to among the following categories? Just answer with the category name without further explanation. categories: [travel, education, parents, style & beauty, entertainment, food & drink, science & technology, business, sports, healthy living, women, politics, crime, culture & arts, religion]
 article: {} category: {}
news_categorize.retrieval_query: Which category does this article relate to among the following categories? arcicle: {text}
news_categorize.retrieval_query_wokey: Which category does this article relate to among the following categories? arcicle: {}
news_categorize.OPPU_input:
Which category does this article relate to among the following categories? Just answer with the category name without further explanation. categories: [travel, education, parents, style & beauty, entertainment, food & drink, science & technology, business, sports, healthy living, women, politics, crime, culture & arts, religion]
 article: {text} category:
news_categorize.OPPU_full:
Which category does this article relate to among the following categories? Just answer with the category name without further explanation. categories: [travel, education, parents, style & beauty, entertainment, food & drink, science & technology, business, sports, healthy living, women, politics, crime, culture & arts, religion]
 article: {text} category: {category}
